tool_description: This service is designed to generate appropriate captions for an input image, which can be used to provide context, create more accessible content, or aid in content discovery.
name: Image Caption / Description Generator
title: Image Caption / Description Generator

api_list.name: /api-v1.0/ImageCaption
api_list.description:
**Request Body**
The request body should be a JSON object with the following keys:
```
{
"api_key"	: "Your assigned API key"
""base64_image": "The Base64 encoded string of the image you wish to analyze"
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-caption-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api-v1.0/ImageCaption"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-caption-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-caption-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api-v1.0/ImageCaption"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-caption-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
